text: Bradford Phillip "Brad" Delson (born December 1, 1977 in Agoura Hills, California) is the lead guitarist of alternative rock band Linkin Park. ==Early life== Brad went to Agoura High School with fellow member of Linkin Park Mike Shinoda. Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:American guitarists Category:Extras Category:Linkin Park members Category:Musicians from Los Angeles
title: Brad Delson
